title: Visitor Policy
content: All visitors must sign in at the front office and wear a visitor badge at all times. Visits to classrooms must be scheduled in advance.

title: Emergency Procedures
content: In case of an emergency, students and staff must follow the evacuation plans posted in each classroom. Regular drills will be conducted to ensure preparedness.

title: Health and Wellness
content: Students are encouraged to wash their hands frequently and use hand sanitizer stations located throughout the school. Sick students should stay home to prevent the spread of illness.

title: Anti-Bullying Policy
content: Our school has a zero-tolerance policy towards bullying. Students and staff are encouraged to report any instances of bullying to the administration immediately.

title: Attendance Policy
content: Regular attendance is crucial for student success. Parents are required to notify the school of any absences. Chronic absenteeism will be addressed by the school administration.

title: Dress Code Policy
content: Students are expected to dress in a manner that is appropriate for a learning environment. Clothing with offensive language or imagery is not permitted.

title: Technology Use Policy
content: Students are encouraged to use school technology responsibly. Personal devices should be used only during designated times and must not disrupt the learning environment.

title: Code of Conduct
content: Students are expected to behave respectfully towards peers and staff. Any form of disrespect, discrimination, or harassment will not be tolerated.

title: Homework Policy
content: Homework is an essential part of the learning process. Students are expected to complete assignments on time. Teachers will provide feedback to support student learning.

title: Extracurricular Activities
content: Students are encouraged to participate in extracurricular activities. These activities help in the overall development of students and foster a sense of community.
